articles.description: One guy lost his hair and peace of mind in the chase. The other represents the epitome of peace and placidity.
articles.content: Sixty-one years ago when Roger Maris hit his 54th home run in the Yankees 140th game, he did so by driving a Tom Cheney pitch into the home bullpen in right field while in the middle of a Murderers R… [+4527 chars]
